title: Single slit - number of dark fringes on screen

content.question: Light of wavelength <math alttext="lambda" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>λ</mi></math> is incident on a narrow slit of width <math alttext="a" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>a</mi></math>. Approximately how many dark fringes appear on a screen of width <math alttext="w" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>w</mi></math> that is a distance <math alttext="D" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>D</mi></math> from the slit? Assume that the fringes appear on the screen at small angular displacements from the central bright maximum.

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction a over lambda" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mi>a</mi><mi>λ</mi></mfrac></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="the fraction w over lambda" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mi>w</mi><mi>λ</mi></mfrac></math>
<math alttext="the fraction with numerator a w D, and denominator lambda" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mi>a</mi><mi>w</mi><mi>D</mi></mrow><mi>λ</mi></mfrac></math>
<math alttext="the fraction with numerator a w, and denominator lambda D" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mi>a</mi><mi>w</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>λ</mi><mi>D</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator a w, and denominator lambda D" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mi>a</mi><mi>w</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>λ</mi><mi>D</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
